mapper.update:
update trip
eid = #{eid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
aim = #{aim,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
startdate = #{startdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
endtime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
time = #{time,jdbcType=INTEGER},
reason = #{reason},
picture = #{picture,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
approver = #{approver,jdbcType=BIGINT},
note = #{note},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
result = #{result,jdbcType=INTEGER},
progress = #{progress,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where tripid = #{tripid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update trip set eid = #{eid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, aim = #{aim,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, startdate = #{startdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, endtime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, time = #{time,jdbcType=INTEGER}, reason = #{reason}, picture = #{picture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, approver = #{approver,jdbcType=BIGINT}, note = #{note}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, result = #{result,jdbcType=INTEGER}, progress = #{progress,jdbcType=INTEGER} where tripid = #{tripid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
